records.text: A vanc peak is timed because it needs to be drawn 1 hours after the infusion finished. (Otherwise, it wouldn't be the peak level, now would it?)A PTT is timed because it needs to be done every 3 hours or something like that.A cortisol is timed because levels fluctuate during the day. An 0800 cortisol will necessarily be different than a 1500 cortisol.Your morning CBC and BMP is not timed. It can wait until we get to that side of the hospital.
